text:
@thehill Sorry, Donald.
Daily testing does not prevent a coronavirus infection. It just confirms when the infection reached a detectable level. If you and WH staffers avoid social distancing and shun wearing a mask, you are DOOMED. This is what you did to the country! #TrumpPandemic
